Title: The Facts of Bleeping Life
Writer: Chris Bishop, Adam F. Goldberg, Lewaa Nasserdeen (staff writer)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Adam and Barry form a garage rock band, and promptly invite Erica and Lainey to join with unforeseen consequences. The royal wedding inspires Bev to renew her vows with Murray.
